textClients.part1: BRAZIL SENSATIONS is a member of ABAV (Brazilian Association of Travel Agencies) and CCFB (France-Brazil Chamber of Commerce), as well as a partner of IGLTA (The International LGBTQ+ Travel Association).
textClients.part2: We are registered as a DMC with the Brazilian Ministry of Tourism. This authentication is renewed every two years in the registry of CADASTUR, the authority that gives agencies the right to operate in the country.
textClients.part3: We are also insured by FATOR..
